objects.name: The IMDDOS Botnet: Discovery and Analysis
objects.description: In less than four months, the Chinese IMDDOS Botnet has become one of the largest active botnets in the world. This report details the discovery of the IMDDOS botnet, the growth and timeline, the commercial aspects of its operation, the technical components of the botnet infrastructure, the malware used, and what is currently being done to disrupt its operation.

objects.name: IMDDOS Malware Indicator
objects.description: Describes IOCs for the initial botnet infection of a host.
objects.pattern: [win-registry-key:key MATCHES '^HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\SafePrec.*$' AND win-registry-key:values[*].name = 'ImagePath' AND win-registry-key:values[*].data MATCHES '^([:xdigit:]){6,10)$'] FOLLOWEDBY [network-traffic:dst_ref.type = 'domain-name' AND network-traffic:dst_ref.value = 'imddos.my03.com' AND network-traffic:extensions.'http-request-ext'.'User-Agent' MATCHES '^(STORMDDOS|YTDDOS|IAMDDOS|i\sam\sddos|kav)$']

objects.name: IMDDOS Target-List Hosting Domain (TLHD) Indicator
objects.description: Describes IOCs for the domains that hosts the file containing the list of targeted domains to be DD0Sâ€™d
objects.pattern: [network-traffic:dst_ref.type = 'domain-name' AND network-traffic:dst_ref.value MATCHES '^(imddos.my03.com|test.dns-dns.com)$' AND network-traffic:dst_port = 9090 AND (network-traffic:protocols[0] = 'tcp' AND network-traffic:protocols[1] = 'http']') AND network-traffic:extensions.'http-request-ext'.request_method = 'get' AND network-traffic:extensions.'http-request-ext'.'request_value' MATCHES '^(test1.html|888.html|bawang.html|puff.html|gesheng.html|090210.html|2764485.html|chinawf518.html|xiaonan888.html)$' AND network-traffic:extensions.'http-request-ext'.Host MATCHES '^(imddos.my03.com|test.dns-dns.com)$' AND network-traffic:extensions.'http-request-ext'.'User-Agent' MATCHES '^(STORMDDOS|YTDDOS|IAMDDOS|i\sam\sddos|kav)$']

objects.name: IMDDOS CnC Domains Indicator
objects.description: Describes IOCs for the IMDDOS CNC domains
